text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in hl7VS-specialtyType
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 394733009 (Medical specialties)
  • Include all codes defined in urn:iso:std:iso:3166
  • Include codes from http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/m49/m49.htm where class = region
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 387961004 (Kingdom Animalia)
  • Import all the codes that are contained in AdministrativeGender
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes
  • Include all codes defined in http://nucc.org/provider-taxonomy
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ActEncounterCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ActTaskCode
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Usage Context Agreement Scope

name: ContextOfUseValueSet
title: Context of Use ValueSet
description: This value set defines a base set of codes that can be used to indicate that the content in a resource was developed with a focus and intent of supporting use within particular contexts.
copyright: This resource includes content from SNOMED Clinical Terms® (SNOMED CT®) which is copyright of the International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO). Implementers of these specifications must have the appropriate SNOMED CT Affiliate license - for more information contact http://www.snomed.org/snomed-ct/get-snomed-ct or info@snomed.org. This value set includes content from NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy Code Set for providers which is copyright © 2016+ American Medical Association. For commercial use, including sales or licensing, a license must be obtained
